en: With uClient, you can control uArm with mouse, in real time.
cn: 您可通过uClient V2.0用鼠标实时控制uArm。

en:
A MUST for EVERY uArm user.
This tool sets up the basic software environment needed for controlling uArm: automatic driver installation,
firmware upgrade and calibration.
cn:
uArm玩家必备。
此工具将为您的电脑安装控制uArm所需的所有软件环境，
包括自动安装驱动，固件升级和校正。

intro.en: uArm Studio is an all-in-one software for controlling uArm Swift & uArm Swift Pro. It includes driver installation and firmware upgrade.
intro.cn: uArm Studio是 uArm Swift 和 uArm Swift Pro 的控制软件，包含驱动安装和固件更新。
